directions: In a blender, combine 1 cup frozen wild blueberries, 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt, 1 scoop plain or vanilla whey protein powder, 1 banana, 1/2 cup pomegranate juice, 1/4 cup walnut pieces, and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract. Whirl until smooth.
ingredients: 1 scoop plain or vanilla whey protein powder
title: High- Protein Blueberry- Yogurt Shake
